## Description {#details}

Mapping from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugvariable">DebugVariable</a> to/from a unique identifying number.

Each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugvariable">DebugVariable</a> consists of three pointers, and after a small amount of work to identify overlapping fragments of variables we mostly only use DebugVariables as identities of variables. It&#39;s much more compile-time efficient to use an <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> number instead, which this class provides.

Definition at line 46 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-h">InstrRefBasedImpl.h</a>.
